info.name: Weekly Email Report API
info.description: API endpoints for weekly transaction performance reports

query.description: Week start date (YYYY-MM-DD, should be a Monday)

request.description:
Get weekly transaction performance report data as JSON.

Returns:
- Current week metrics
- Previous week metrics
- Week-over-week changes
- Top 5 currencies breakdown

Generate and send weekly performance email report.

Note: Email sending is disabled by default. To enable:
1. Configure email credentials in .env
2. Uncomment email sending code in app/main.py
3. Restart server

Test email generation with a test recipient.

Use this to verify:
- Report data generation
- Email template rendering
- Response format

Before sending real emails.
